DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on behalf of the signed-in user
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write admin report settings
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write admin report settings
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and update admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all admin report settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update all admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, without a signed-in user.
